description: These crispy, chunky polenta chips are a real treat with truffle oil and parmesan on top.
name: Truffle & Parmesan Polenta Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.6 cup vegetable stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the stock to the boil in a large pan and slowly whisk in 150g of polenta. Cook for 4-5 minutes, stirring constantly, until it begins to thicken. Stir in half of the parmesan and thyme. Pour the mix into a lined baking tin and place in the fridge to chill for 1 hour.
Cut the firmed up polenta into chunky chips. Brush each chip with olive oil. Spread the rest of the polenta on a plate and dip each chip in to coat lightly.

Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Arrange the polenta chips in a single layer on a lined baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes. Serve with a drizzle of truffle oil and the rest of the grated parmesan and sea salt on top.
